articles.description: Israel's Defense Ministry and the Israel Defense Forces on Friday asked residents to evacuate from the northern city of Kiryat Shmona, near the Lebanon border.
articles.content:
The International Committee of the Red Cross helped facilitate the release of the two American hostages by transporting them from Gaza to Israel, the organization said.

articles.author: Brenda Goodman
articles.title: A tropical parasite, passed through the bite of a sand fly, is causing skin infections in the US - CNN
articles.description: Move over mosquitos. There’s another blood-sucking biter Americans need to guard against because it can spread disease: the sand fly.
articles.content:
Move over mosquitos. Theres another blood-sucking biter Americans need to guard against because it can spread disease: the sand fly.
